column1: }}'''''The Mines of Moria''''' is a [[1985]] text-adventure by [[Eamon]],<ref name="Reference1">[http://ifdb.tads.org/viewgame?id=ec36sw7nepy6rdeh The Interactive Fiction Database] (Retrieved 26 October 2010)</ref> being the first in ''[[The Lord of the Rings (Eamon series)
column2: The Lord of the Rings]]'' series<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mines-moria.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 26 October 2010)</ref>, and was later followed by ''[[Return to Moria]]''.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> It was made by [[Sam Ruby]].<ref name="Reference1"/><ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
